name: llamatic
description: Lightweight local llama.cpp model manager (no Electron)
author: Isht-Wow

scripts.build:mac:app:arm64: pkg . -t node18-macos-arm64 -o llamatic-arm64 && codesign -f -s - llamatic-arm64 && ./build_app.sh Llamatic llamatic-arm64 Llamatic.jpeg
scripts.build:mac:app:intel: pkg . -t node18-macos-x64 -o llamatic-intel && codesign -f -s - llamatic-intel && ./build_app.sh Llamatic-Intel llamatic-intel Llamatic.jpeg
scripts.dist:win:x64: pkg . -t node18-win-x64 -o llamatic-win.exe && ./build_dist.sh win x64 llamatic-win.exe Llamatic.jpeg
scripts.dist:win:arm64: pkg . -t node18-win-arm64 -o llamatic-win-arm64.exe && ./build_dist.sh win arm64 llamatic-win-arm64.exe Llamatic.jpeg
scripts.dist:linux:x64: pkg . -t node18-linux-x64 -o llamatic-linux && ./build_dist.sh linux x64 llamatic-linux
